sn22.85:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā sāriputto sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
sn22.85:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena yamakassa nāma bhikkhuno evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ hoti:
sn22.85:4.3: “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi, yathā khīṇāsavo bhikkhu kāyassa bhedā ucchijjati vinassati, na hoti paraṃ maraṇā”ti.
sn22.85:5.1: Assosuṃ kho sambahulā bhikkhū yamakassa kira nāma bhikkhuno evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ hoti:
sn22.85:5.2: “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi, yathā khīṇāsavo bhikkhu kāyassa bhedā ucchijjati vinassati, na hoti paraṃ maraṇā”ti.
sn22.85:5.3: Atha kho te bhikkhū yenāyasmā yamako tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
sn22.85:5.5: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
sn22.85:5.6: Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ yamakaṃ etadavocuṃ:
sn22.85:6.1: “Saccaṃ kira te, āvuso yamaka, evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ:
sn22.85:6.2: ‘tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi, yathā khīṇāsavo bhikkhu kāyassa bhedā ucchijjati vinassati, na hoti paraṃ maraṇā’”ti?
sn22.85:6.3: “Evaṃ khvāhaṃ, āvuso, bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi:
sn22.85:6.4: ‘khīṇāsavo bhikkhu kāyassa bhedā ucchijjati vinassati, na hoti paraṃ maraṇā’”ti.
sn22.85:7.1: “Mā, āvuso yamaka, evaṃ avaca, mā bhagavantaṃ abbhācikkhi.
sn22.85:7.4: ‘khīṇāsavo bhikkhu kāyassa bhedā ucchijjati vinassati, na hoti paraṃ maraṇā’”ti.
sn22.85:7.5: Evampi kho āyasmā yamako tehi bhikkhūhi vuccamāno tatheva taṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ thāmasā parāmāsā abhinivissa voharati:
sn22.85:7.6: “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi, yathā khīṇāsavo bhikkhu kāyassa bhedā ucchijjati vinassati, na hoti paraṃ maraṇā”ti.
sn22.85:8.1: Yato kho te bhikkhū nāsakkhiṃsu āyasmantaṃ yamakaṃ etasmā pāpakā diṭṭhigatā vivecetuṃ, atha kho te bhikkhū uṭṭhāyāsanā yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
sn22.85:8.3: “yamakassa nāma, āvuso sāriputta, bhikkhuno evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ:
sn22.85:8.4: ‘tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi yathā khīṇāsavo bhikkhu kāyassa bhedā ucchijjati vinassati, na hoti paraṃ maraṇā’ti.
sn22.85:8.5: Sādhāyasmā sāriputto yena yamako bhikkhu tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṃ upādāyā”ti.
sn22.85:8.7: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā yamako tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.85:8.8: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā yamakena saddhiṃ sammodi … pe …
sn22.85:8.9: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṃ yamakaṃ etadavoca:
sn22.85:9.1: “Saccaṃ kira te, āvuso yamaka, evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ:
sn22.85:9.2: ‘tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi, yathā khīṇāsavo bhikkhu kāyassa bhedā ucchijjati vinassati, na hoti paraṃ maraṇā’”ti?
sn22.85:9.3: “Evaṃ khvāhaṃ, āvuso, bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi, yathā khīṇāsavo bhikkhu kāyassa bhedā ucchijjati vinassati, na hoti paraṃ maraṇā”ti.
sn22.85:10.1: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, āvuso yamaka, rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti?
sn22.85:11.1: Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, āvuso yamaka, rūpaṃ tathāgatoti samanupassasī”ti?
sn22.85:12.1: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, āvuso yamaka, rūpasmiṃ tathāgatoti samanupassasī”ti?
sn22.85:14.1: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, āvuso yamaka, ayaṃ so arūpī …
sn22.85:14.7: “Ettha ca te, āvuso yamaka, diṭṭheva dhamme saccato thetato tathāgate anupalabbhiyamāne, kallaṃ nu te taṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ:
sn22.85:14.8: ‘tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi, yathā khīṇāsavo bhikkhu kāyassa bhedā ucchijjati vinassati, na hoti paraṃ maraṇā’”ti?
sn22.85:15.1: “Ahu kho me taṃ, āvuso sāriputta, pubbe aviddasuno pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ;
sn22.85:15.2: idañca panāyasmato sāriputtassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā tañceva pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ pahīnaṃ, dhammo ca me abhisamito”ti.
sn22.85:16.2: ‘yo so, āvuso yamaka, bhikkhu arahaṃ khīṇāsavo so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā kiṃ hotī’ti?
sn22.85:16.3: Evaṃ puṭṭho tvaṃ, āvuso yamaka, kinti byākareyyāsī”ti?
sn22.85:16.5: ‘yo so, āvuso yamaka, bhikkhu arahaṃ khīṇāsavo so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā kiṃ hotī’ti?
sn22.85:17.2: Tena hāvuso yamaka, upamaṃ te karissāmi etasseva atthassa bhiyyoso mattāya ñāṇāya.
sn22.85:17.3: Seyyathāpi, āvuso yamaka, gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā aḍḍho mahaddhano mahābhogo;
sn22.85:17.5: Tassa kocideva puriso uppajjeyya anatthakāmo ahitakāmo ayogakkhemakāmo jīvitā voropetukāmo.
sn22.85:17.7: ‘ayaṃ kho gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā aḍḍho mahaddhano mahābhogo;
sn22.85:17.9: nāyaṃ sukaro pasayha jīvitā voropetuṃ.
sn22.85:17.11: So taṃ gahapatiṃ vā gahapatiputtaṃ vā upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadeyya:
sn22.85:17.13: Tamenaṃ so gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā upaṭṭhāpeyya.
sn22.85:17.14: So upaṭṭhaheyya pubbuṭṭhāyī pacchānipātī kiṃkārapaṭissāvī manāpacārī piyavādī.
sn22.85:17.15: Tassa so gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā mittatopi naṃ saddaheyya;
sn22.85:17.18: Yadā kho, āvuso, tassa purisassa evamassa:
sn22.85:17.19: ‘saṃvissattho kho myāyaṃ gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā’ti, atha naṃ rahogataṃ viditvā tiṇhena satthena jīvitā voropeyya.
sn22.85:18.1: Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, āvuso yamaka, yadā hi so puriso amuṃ gahapatiṃ vā gahapatiputtaṃ vā upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ āha:
sn22.85:18.5: Yadāpi so upaṭṭhahati pubbuṭṭhāyī pacchānipātī kiṅkārapaṭissāvī manāpacārī piyavādī, tadāpi so vadhakova.
sn22.85:18.8: Yadāpi naṃ rahogataṃ viditvā tiṇhena satthena jīvitā voropeti, tadāpi so vadhakova.
sn22.85:18.12: “Evameva kho, āvuso, assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṃ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto, sappurisānaṃ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto rūpaṃ attato samanupassati, rūpavantaṃ vā attānaṃ;
sn22.85:18.13: attani vā rūpaṃ, rūpasmiṃ vā attānaṃ.
sn22.85:18.17: viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassati, viññāṇavantaṃ vā attānaṃ;
sn22.85:18.18: attani vā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇasmiṃ vā attānaṃ.
sn22.85:19.1: So aniccaṃ rūpaṃ ‘aniccaṃ rūpan’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
sn22.85:24.1: So rūpaṃ upeti upādiyati adhiṭṭhāti ‘attā me’ti.
sn22.85:24.6: Tassime pañcupādānakkhandhā upetā upādinnā dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanti.
sn22.85:25.1: Sutavā ca kho, āvuso, ariyasāvako ariyānaṃ dassāvī … pe …
sn22.85:25.2: sappurisadhamme suvinīto na rūpaṃ attato samanupassati, na rūpavantaṃ attānaṃ;
sn22.85:25.3: na attani rūpaṃ, na rūpasmiṃ attānaṃ.
sn22.85:25.7: na viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassati, na viññāṇavantaṃ attānaṃ;
sn22.85:25.8: na attani viññāṇaṃ, na viññāṇasmiṃ attānaṃ.
sn22.85:26.1: So aniccaṃ rūpaṃ ‘aniccaṃ rūpan’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
sn22.85:31.1: So rūpaṃ na upeti, na upādiyati, nādhiṭṭhāti:
sn22.85:31.6: viññāṇaṃ na upeti, na upādiyati, nādhiṭṭhāti:
sn22.85:31.8: Tassime pañcupādānakkhandhā anupetā anupādinnā dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya saṃvattantī”ti.
sn22.85:31.9: “Evametaṃ, āvuso sāriputta, hoti yesaṃ āyasmantānaṃ tādisā sabrahmacārino anukampakā atthakāmā ovādakā anusāsakā.
sn22.85:31.10: Idañca pana me āyasmato sāriputtassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuttan”ti.
